name: Aidoku Source
subtitle: Home of Aidoku, free and open source manga reader for iOS and iPadOS
description:
This is the AltStore Source for Aidoku, free and open source manga reader for iOS and iPadOS.

For full details on what's included, check the website: https://aidoku.app/

apps.name: Aidoku
apps.subtitle: Free and open source manga reader for iOS and iPadOS
apps.localizedDescription: A free and open source manga reading application for iOS and iPadOS.

privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Aidoku needs FaceID permissions for user-defined settings
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Aidoku needs permission to save pages in your photo library
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Aidoku needs permission to connect to local Komga servers

versions.localizedDescription:
• Tap zones: tap the sides of the screen to switch pages without needing to swipe.
• Download manager: view and read all downloaded chapters, and see more detailed storage usage.
• Image upscaling (experimental): download ML image upscaling models to improve low quality images while reading. Note that this can increase the time it takes for images to load, especially for slower/older devices, and is still very much an experimental feature.
• Keyboard support: use a connected keyboard (or if you’re just using macOS) to turn pages.
• Custom series covers: select from alternate covers if a source provides them, or upload your own cover images.
• Rewritten History tab: it should hopefully look pretty much the same… but be a bit less buggy! The excessive stuttering, long loading times, and needless reloading in some cases were fixed.
• Other features and fixes:
    • Manual page image reload option (if a page loads incorrectly)
    • Uploading local files should actually work now
    • Tracker searching now has a toggle•able filter for NSFW results
    • …and more!
